games.name: Quiz Battle (Showdown)
games.description: Timed multiple-choice battle on key facts like twin cities, construction materials, sanitation evidence.

games.name: Build the City Puzzle
games.description: Drag-and-drop game to rebuild Mohenjo-Daro with correct features like Great Bath, wells, granaries.

games.name: Feature Matching Game
games.description: Match features like Great Bath, public wells to their descriptions (e.g., ritual bath, equal access).

games.name: Doodle It Challenge
games.description: Create and vote on doodles that summarize the civilization’s key elements.

games.name: Time-Travel Roleplay
games.description: Pretend to be a citizen of Harappa or Mohenjo-Daro and describe life in the ancient city.

games.name: Fact or Fiction Showdown
games.description: Rapid-fire quiz to determine whether a statement is real or fictional.

games.name: Wormhole vs Alternate Universe Debate
games.description: Students take sides and debate using evidence from videos.

games.name: Muggle Newsroom Simulation
games.description: Write a news report explaining the boys’ disappearance using chosen theory (wormhole or alternate universe).

games.name: Scene Creator Challenge
games.description: Create and act out a scene in a fictional setting explained by wormhole or alternate universe logic.

games.name: Theory Tag
games.description: Identify and tag scenarios/statements as belonging to a wormhole or alternate universe explanation.

games.name: Solve the Crime Mystery Game
games.description: Investigate a crime scene, collect evidence, perform DNA profiling, and find the culprit.

games.name: Evidence Hunt Puzzle
games.description: Identify objects that can provide DNA in a drag-and-drop puzzle.

games.name: CSI Report Roleplay
games.description: Report on the crime scene including quotes, steps taken, and final outcome.

games.name: DNA Snap Sorter
games.description: Match correct sequence of evidence handling steps using drag-and-drop cards.

games.name: DNA Clue Trail
games.description: Stepwise game where clues based on DNA analysis lead to the next clue until culprit is found.

games.name: Car Race Leaderboard Game
games.description: Race cars shown on screen where students assign correct ordinal positions.

games.name: Red Light, Green Light
games.description: Follow red/green signals while solving ordinal number questions in real-time.

games.name: Garage Parking Puzzle
games.description: Drag cars into correct garage slots based on ordinal position from first to tenth.

games.name: Calendar Creator Activity
games.description: Mark and label dates using ordinal numbers in a custom calendar.

games.name: Race Reporter Roleplay
games.description: Act as a sports commentator using ordinal numbers to describe race positions.
